sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { injectIntl } from "react-intl"; import { Link, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import { FormattedMessage } from "react-intl"; import generatePID from "../../../../../Common/Util/PIDGenerator"; import "./index.scss"; class index extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {}; } onClickWizlabTemplate = (id) => { const { userinfo } = this.props; const pId = generatePID(userinfo.email); if (userinfo.id) { window.open(`/builder/${pId}/${id}`, "_blank"); } else { window.open(`/builder?t=${id}`, "_blank"); } } render() { return ( <>
